seo.title: UnstressVN - Language Learning Community
seo.description: Join our community to discover language learning resources, video lessons, and connect with learners worldwide.

hero.title: Discover. Connect. Master.
hero.subtitle: Your modern sanctuary for language resources, curated video lessons, and vibrant community discussions.

resources.title: Rich Library
resources.description: Access curated learning materials for multiple languages.

partners.title: Find Partners
partners.description: Connect with language exchange partners worldwide.

forum.title: Community Forum
forum.description: Join discussions and share your learning journey.

news.title: News & Knowledge
news.description: Stay updated with study abroad news, lifestyle, and language knowledge.

videos.title: Learning Videos
videos.description: Video lessons, short films, and diverse learning content.

howItWorks.title: How UnstressVN Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Start your language learning journey in just 3 simple steps

step1.title: Read Articles
step1.description: Explore our knowledge base with articles on grammar, vocabulary, and learning tips.

step2.title: Download Resources
step2.description: Download books, textbooks, and German/English learning materials for free.

step3.title: Use Learning Tools
step3.description: Learn with flashcards, practice pronunciation, and use dictionary tools.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Learning Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of language learners. Access free resources, find study partners, and connect with a global community.

seo.title: About Us - UnstressVN
seo.description: Learn about UnstressVN, our mission to connect language learners worldwide, and how we help people master new languages through community-driven learning.

about.title: About UnstressVN
about.subtitle: Connecting language learners and empowering global communication

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: UnstressVN was founded with a simple belief: language learning should be accessible, community-driven, and enjoyable. We create a space where learners from all backgrounds can connect, share resources, and grow together.

resources.title: Curated Resources
resources.description: Access a library of quality learning materials including books, videos, audio courses, and articles for multiple languages and all skill levels.

partners.title: Language Partners
partners.description: Find native speakers and fellow learners to practice with. Our matching system helps you connect with the right study partners based on your goals.

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join discussions, ask questions, and share your learning journey with thousands of language enthusiasts from around the world.

inclusivity.title: Inclusivity
inclusivity.description: We welcome learners from all backgrounds, cultures, and skill levels.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We believe in the power of community-driven learning and peer support.

quality.title: Quality Content
quality.description: We curate and share only the best learning resources and materials.

growth.title: Continuous Growth
growth.description: We encourage lifelong learning and celebrate every step of progress.

seo.title: Contact Us - UnstressVN
seo.description: Get in touch with the UnstressVN team. We're here to help with questions, feedback, or partnership inquiries.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.description: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your question or feedback...

seo.title: Terms of Service - UnstressVN
seo.description: Read our terms of service to understand your rights and responsibilities when using UnstressVN.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using UnstressVN, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

account.title: User Account
account.item1: You must provide accurate and complete information when registering an account.
account.item2: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your login credentials.
account.item3: You must be at least 13 years old to use our services.
account.item4: Each person is only allowed to own one account.

content.title: User Content
content.intro: When uploading content to UnstressVN, you agree that:
content.item1: The content belongs to you or you have the right to use it.
content.item2: The content does not violate copyright, trademark, or intellectual property rights of others.
content.item3: The content does not contain false, misleading, or fraudulent information.
content.item4: The content is not pornographic, violent, or hateful in nature.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Behavior
prohibited.intro: The following behaviors are strictly prohibited on the platform:
prohibited.item1: Spam, unauthorized advertising, or mass messaging.
prohibited.item2: Harassment, threats, or bullying of other users.
prohibited.item3: Impersonating others or creating fake accounts.
prohibited.item4: Attacking, sabotaging, or interfering with the system.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, design, logos, and UnstressVN trademarks are owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, distribute, or create derivative works without written permission.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.item1: Services are provided "as is" without any warranties.
disclaimer.item2: We are not responsible for user-generated content.
disclaimer.item3: We do not guarantee that services will operate continuously or without errors.
disclaimer.item4: You assume all risk when downloading materials from the platform.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon posting. Continued use of services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about the terms of service, please contact us through the

seo.title: Privacy Policy - UnstressVN
seo.description: Learn how UnstressVN collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At UnstressVN, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.item2: Profile information: avatar, bio, learning languages
collection.item3: Content you post: articles, comments, messages

usage.title: How We Use Information
usage.item4: Analyze and research for product development

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do NOT sell your personal information. We only share in the following cases:
sharing.item2: With trusted service partners (hosting, email, analytics)
sharing.item4: To protect the rights and safety of the platform

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
rights.accessDesc: View data we store about you
rights.exportDesc: Download a copy of your data

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. Significant changes will be notified via email or platform notification. The update date will be noted at the top of the page.

contact.title: Privacy Contact
contact.content: If you have questions or requests about personal data, please contact:
